Posts.Content: On 12/29/2007 ruthlillian wrote: Had surgery last month to remove ACC from breast. My nodes were negative and my margins were clear. Radiation is being considered but not a certainty.No other treatment is being considered or recommended. I would like to know what others have experienced in similar situations.Many thanks.
Posts.Title: Adenoid Cystic Carcinoma in the Breast

Posts.Content: I am curious if you decided to do radiation or not I am trying ti make that same decision myself after removing stage 2 ACC of breast, thanks Jakes24
Posts.Title: Adenoid Cystic Carcinoma in the Breast

Posts.Content: I have just had a lumpectomy and gotten pathology report stating ACC, I am scheduled to see an oncologist in two weeks, I would appreciate any information, this is a shock for me plus it is sooo rare. thanks
